title: MLG Strategist Recruiting Players for Cometitive Gold-Plat League. READ FULLY BEFORE APPLYING***
body:
LOOKING FOR GOLD 5-Plat5 Players only*******


                                                                                                **About us**


Hello all i am Zoa, the founder of MLG Strategist  . I want to tell you guys a little about us we are an Organization that have a vision of being a future LCS Team. We will start by playing in Gold-Platinum leagues and working our way up as a team. As the title says we are looking for Starters in certain positions and Subs for all roles. Now dont be discourage if you are a sub because that means you will be on our Academy team which we will find a league for you guys to play in as well as consistently scrimming the main team and working your way on to the main roster.


**As Owner what you can expect from me**

    I will keep and maintain a competitive team.
    I will find us scrims weekly.
    I will put up money for the team to get into leagues and tournaments.
    I am the owner and also Adc for the team so i shot call.
    I will handle all questions and concerns the team might have.

What is expected of Applicants
We will be practicing a minimum of 4 days a week if this is a problem for anyone its best you find another respected team to join. Missing excessive practices will lead to immediate termination. We are very big on practicing and working as a team here at MLG Strategist so i emphasize being on time for practice and being ready to Go! Next thing is Toxicity will not be tolerated at all there are ways of getting our points across during game and after the game when we talk about what we could of done better or game strategies. We are here to build each other up . So with all this being said here is the APPLICATION.
_



**WE WILL BE HOSTING INTERVIEWS TODAY AND TOMORROW**_





IGN
Rank
Role
Champs
Why do you want to join
(The rest will be discussed in interview for those who made it that far)
We look forward to hearing from you guys! Lets win

replies.body:
IGN: Kurik
Rank: Diamond IV
Role: Mid( Willing to learn more top although
Current Main Champions: Akali, Xerath, Cassiopeia, Syndra, Kassadin, Diana
Why do you want to join: 
For a couple months I have been trying to learn enough of the game to climb to a point where I could play in a tournament scene respectively, and am currently searching for a competitive team to play with in tournaments and on ranked 5v5 ladders. I would like to expand my regime of characters and orient them towards team play, willing to dedicate 2 hours a day minimum to the growth of myself as a player and to the growth as a team. Thank you for this opportunity and I look forward to  further contacting you in an interview.

IGN: Dank Sock
Rank: Plat 5
Role: ADC
Champs: Caitlyn, Sivir, and Ezreal. 
Why do you want to join: I want to join because i want to learn the game more, play serious with other people who want to play serious that would want to play as a team, and for the experience.

IGN: Opoppy
Rank: Gold 1
Role: Top
Champs: Pantheon, poppy, wukong, malphite. (more but those are the main champions I play)
Why do you want to join: I am looking for a competitive team as I generally find it more enjoyable than dynamic queue, but have been having a hard time finding a team that plays on a consistent basis.

IGN Roxt Peanut
Rank G3
Role jg
Champs i play meta picks so my pool is changing as the meta changes ill work on what i feel is best
I want to join because im looking for serious people who care about improving and will work hard as a team to do so

IGN: TDW Wartaa
Rank: S1 (Will be gold before end of season. Have been gold for the past 3 or so seasons. I lose count haha)
Role: Jungle
Champs: Main: Naut Trundle Sej Rek Gragas and Shyvana. Can and will learn any and all champs needed for team comps. Will put insane amount of effort into when asked to learn a certain champ
Why do you want to join: Seems like a serious team. I have been looking for one to grow with and see how far we can push. Seems like this is the right choice to help me make it further in league.

Ign: pawnshopdonkey
Rank: plat 5
Role : Ad carry baby 
Champs : mostly all the adcs 
Why I want to join: let's make it to lcs ;)
Interview me today if possible

IGN: Jed123
Rank: Gold 5
Role: Top
Champs: {{champion:78}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:126}}, and many more.
Why do you want to join: I have been wanting to play in a league before and have joined or created teams in the past that have fallen apart because of people simply not showing up anymore. I really want to be part of a team that will stick together and work together to accomplish a common goal.

I can play to any support style and will be willing to make practices, although I will need more specificity on their respective times. Looking forward to playing together!

Rank: Gold V
Role: Mid/Top/ADC
Champs: (In respective order) {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:103}} / {{champion:157}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:2}} / {{champion:81}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:202}} 
Why do you want to join: Always wanted to join a team trying to go pro, gives me a reason to take this game seriously.

IGN: Midnight Mists (Message me on Midmists, I will be on that account for right now)
Rank: Plat 5
Role: Support
Champs: Most common( Janna, Leona, Sona, Lux, Zyra) Less common(Nami, Braum, Blitz, Morg, Thresh
Why do you want to join: I have always wanted to join a team but something always happens, like the team splits up, the leader disbands the team, stuff like that. I like to play for fun but I also like to play to get better. Since I have never been on a team for more than a couple weeks, I dont know what to expect. I want to join for the experience of being on one and to hopefully help you get where you want your team to go.  I may not be the best player out there but I do listen to the shot calls and I I try my best to make sure the adc doesn't die.

IGN: KenKenKenzie

Rank: Gold 2

Role: Support

Champs: I can play all the supports besides maybe kench, my top 5 are: Thresh, Janna, Poppy, Nami, Braum

Why do you want to join: I want to join a a dedicated team mainly to get better at the game. Ive been playing scarcely since Rek' sai came out, but have been on every almost every day ( when I don't have event / plans and such ) striving to get better for about 4 - 3 months ish now. My dream is to be the first girl to make it to worlds XD ( yes yes don't make fun of me I've gotten it all before ) and well win it. I'm dedicated, ready to learn and win.

About me: I'm 16 still in school, straight over 90% in all classes. Because I'm still in school I can only really play in the afternoons, I'm in eastern time btw. It was my brothers who introduced me to league, they don't play much anymore. I'm very up to date on the competitive scene. I watch them to see what I can do better via shot calling map pressure and such. 

I hope I made a good impression, talk to u soon!

Great question Loony. I cant say right now as of when practices will be because it will be based around our schedules. However the likelyhood of it being around 7pm Est to 9est Is very good. 


 BTW Read post guys im looking for players Gold v-Plat5

> [{quoted}](name=Zoa,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=sE4nNXJ4,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-10-31T19:40:35.538+0000)
>
> Great question Loony. I cant say right now as of when practices will be because it will be based around our schedules. However the likelyhood of it being around 7pm Est to 9est Is very good. 
> 
> 
>  BTW Read post guys im looking for players Gold v-Plat5

Ok I should not have a problem dedicating 2 hours a day 4 days a week as long as we don't end later then 11 Pm EST. If interested my application is above.

A few suggestions to edit your above statements. Statement of your defined elo / proof for the skeptical people here, and statement of why you deem yourself worthy to be sole shotcaller. Many people find moments to challenge calls, as collectively an idea may sound better than yours. I write this not to challenge you or call you out, but to allow you to elaborate on why / true benefits you can offer to better the future team. It helps to understand the leader of a group, before finding out the indepth quirks that make yourself up. If you were a challenger level player who specializes in coaching game knowledge, and promoting individual skill, that informs us that your leadership / group management skills can band a group together. You are a diamond level player according to your icon highlight so that informs me specifically that you indeed have proven worthy to oversee the development of a group, but voice YOUR skill out there; let us know we can trust you. Also I do meet the requirements above, as of now I am Gold 5, but sadly I don't think i would last long as being 16 along with time zones I may not be able to fully commit to the team throughout weekdays; weekends yes. Missing multiple practices would probably be due to my timing, and assignments due. In the event I can still be accepted as a substitute player, and my schedule could fit in possibly as a substitute, or official (next year - open schedule) here is my information

Rank - Gold 5
Role - Mid / Bot 
Champs - Ahri Jinx Janna Nami ( I don't know how many you require so I listed champs I sustain a 60% wr solo)
Why do you want to join - This ties into the third reason I am replying. I am an editor who edits League, and Cod, but predominantly league. I did figure you would want someone to handle editing of highlight / clips of team/members. Whilst I am still newer and learning to the editing field it would help to practice with a group. I do want to join the team as a member, but I know scheduling could prove to not work. 
Weekdays 3:30 to 8 are times I could commit on maximum if I have no major workload. 
Weekends for everyone here are all based on fate. 

In the event I am still denied though i'd at least like to be to follow and see development of team. It seems like an interesting setup
I have most chat services, only ones I can think I lack is teamspeak on this computer.

Before Applying I would like more specificity on the expected practice days and times. How long will practices be?

I live in AZ and im a very competitive person who wants to get high rank and be the best player i can be, so i hope to hear from you soon:)
